description: Manage Red Hat Network registration using the C(rhnreg_ks) command

systemorgid.description: supply an organizational id for use with registration

enable_eus.description: If true, extended update support will be requested.

server_url.description: Specify an alternative Red Hat Network server URL

channels.description: Optionally specify a list of comma-separated channels to subscribe to upon successful registration.

state.description: whether to register (C(present)), or unregister (C(absent)) a system

sslcacert.description: supply a custom ssl CA certificate file for use with registration

activationkey.description: supply an activation key for use with registration

profilename.description: supply an profilename for use with registration
